column1: Urgent Opening For Circle Operations Manager-Indore
column2: Position: Circle Operations Manager        Location: Indore        Industry: Telecom                Operations-Passive Infra:        Responsible to achieve monthly service sales revenue targets and ensure service delivery.    Create and execute monthly/weekly preventive maintenance (PM) plan and minimize breakdown (BD) calls.    Ensure that quality of service is maintained and equipment uptime is maintained as per SLA    Spare and inventory management.    Ensure that checks and control on spares, KPI penalty, manpower cost, reimbursements, etc are in place    Study the field failure report and implement strategies to ensure high equipment availability.    Monthly billing and ensure revenue realization.      Projects:        Ensure that revenue targets for installation/commissioning are met on a monthly basis.    Track the progress of projects and update customer and internal stakeholders.    Quality job is executed by vendor so that acceptance testing (AT) is done smoothly.    Ensue timely billing and revenue realization as per payment terms.      Business Growth:        Analyze market trends & formulate selling and marketing strategies.    To understand client needs and expectations & devise solutions accordingly to drive sales, augment turnover and achieve desired target.    Ensure consistent, profitable growth in sales revenue through positive planning, deployment and management.      Hiring, People Engagement & Development:        Maintain adequate manpower in field and office through internal transfer / promotion / hiring.    Technical and process training for new and existing staff.    Analyze training need and implement programs for field engineers.    Periodically measure employee performance and coach/motivate employee to perform better.    Mentor/coach/train high potential/performers to take on added responsibility / new roles    Resolve/highlight employee issues and take decisive actions on non performers.      Customer Satisfaction:        Meet regularly with the customer and update him about field operations.    Share insights with customers to help them perform better.    Apprise customer on new products / service offerings and generate business.    Share details on KPIs, Customer Value Report, Call Analysis Report, etc with customer.     Required Candidate profile Good Communication skills Leadership Good administrator Well versed in people management.? Customer Interaction and management Service of Passive Infra
column11: dg, shelter, preventive maintenance, Maintenance, battery, IPMS, operations, battery bank, service delivery, Passive Infra, passive infrastructure, ups, business growth, SMPS, service sales, piu

column2: A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys project management team, your primary role would be to take end-to-end bottom line responsibility for a Project.  You will lead the proposal preparation, review the project estimations, capture inputs from key stakeholders to position Infosys suitably in order to seal the deal.  You will schedule assignments, monitor, review and report project status regularly in order to manage project risks and ensure successful project delivery and implementation.  You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.  You would be a key contributor in creating thought leadership within the area of technology specialization and in compliance with guidelines, policies and norms of Infosys.If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: PROJECT MANAGEMENT ALONG WITH CLOUD SKILL - SNOWFLAKE/AZURE/AZURE/AWS  Preferred Skills: Foundational->Project Management->Project Management  Educational Requirements Bachelor of Engineering
column11: project management, Project reporting, Azure, Project estimations, Team coaching, Stakeholder management, Project monitoring, Snowflake, Proposal preparation, Project scheduling, Vision creation, Risk management, Project delivery, AWS

column2: Role & responsibilities     JD for Project Engineer is as follows: 1) Project Implementation 2) To attend site meeting, understanding the drawing 3) Handle installation aspects related to AV projects, like site bracket marking, cabling / raceway marking, cut out marking 4) To Configure AV devices, understand site requirement and work with other vendors for site dependencies, customer co-ordination etc. 5) Troubleshoot AV equipment, send site reports etc.  About the Company PBML is the leading system integrator of AV products, delivering comprehensive solutions that exceed traditional expectations. Our versatile portfolio extends beyond the top of the line Video Collaboration Systems, incorporating Audio Systems, Display Solutions, Digital Signage, & more. These are designed to cater to a wide array of environments, from cozy meeting rooms to large auditoriums or even more informal town hall setups. For over 29 years, we've been growing our network across India. At the heart of this success is our committed team, who are not just focused, but also service-driven. They're the reason we're known for our top-notch customer service. Join hands with PBML & let's reshape the future of communication together. Head Office: Goregaon East, Mumbai. column2: Responsibilities Liase with clients,  project managers and design team on project specifications,  to establish a shared understanding of project scope,  budget,  success indicators,  quality,  environmental,  and safety standards. To produce,  review,  and implement,  installation inspection and testing plans,  programs,  and packages,  that meet the requirements of Project Works,  and Site Integrity Agreements. To ensure new and altered signalling works are comprehensively inspected,  tested and commissioned,  and appropriate records are produced that demonstrate process effectiveness  Facilitate commissioning to ensure all necessary activities are completed,  using suitably accredited resources. Review Contractors inspection and test plans,  programs,  and packages,  before approving them for use. Implement the Handover Documentation Package Adhere to the environmental policy,  and actively engage in fair and equitable workplace practices. Comply with OH&S policy,  and Safety Management System,  to ensure a safe and reliable rail network. Knowledge /  Experience Requirements:   Accredited Signal Engineer,  Field  (Licensed to practice as a Signal Engineer in accordance with applicable Engineering Standards of Clients or IRSE Licence 1.3.190 Tester in Charge  (Signalling)  with extensive experience working as Commissioning Engineer on medium to large sized Signalling projects.  Knowledge of business objectives,  policies and procedures for project management and those of HR,  quality,  safety,  the environment and finance relevant to projects. Sufficient knowledge and understanding of rail operations to enable the production and implementation of signalling interface management plans. Detailed knowledge of applicable and required Signalling Construction Specifications,  with demonstrated experience in document and specification preparation and contribution to the tendering process,  including costing projects and preparing budgets. Demonstrated project management experience,  including monitoring and reporting on project progress and knowledge of project management software. Demonstrated experience in coordinating all aspects of signalling construction projects from concept to completion. Current competency certificate for Inspection,  Testing and Commissioning of New and Altered Signalling Works
column11: project management, projects, quality

column2: Brief Role :  Principal Strategy Consultant-  Telecom/  Media & Entertainment   Job Description  Principal Strategy Consultant -  Telecom/ Media & Entertainment -  IIM/ FMS/ MDI  Strategy Consultant (Telecom Media & Entertainment) Experience : Big Four/ Strategy Firms/  Industry Experience ( Telecom,  Media Entertainment) Specific experiences will include : Experience levels in business and consulting : Strategy Consultant : 10 to 14 Years Experience -  Full- time MBA from tier 1 institute. -  Must have deep knowledge in one of the following : Telecom Media or Entertainment Demonstrated expertise and thought Leadership on changing Landscape in the fiercely competitive Telecom Segment: -  Strategic Approach to Pricing & outlining the competitive advantage and the experience of managing the CXO relationship. -  Good Prior Experience in Strategy Consulting Firm. -  Working with senior strategy professionals to manage delivery of modules,  risk,  project economics including planning and budgeting,  defining deliverable content,  ensuring buy- in of proposed solutions from top management levels at the client. -  Target and quantify the value of an operations transformation opportunity,  work on creating a point of view that can be presented to the C- suite and drive targeted improvement.  Business Development :  -  Work on business development opportunities,  identify and quantify value creation opportunities and prepare a business case. Lead or be part of client site visits and preparation of the proposal documents People Development : Performing the role of counselor and advisor to the client Market Development : GTM. RTM overview  Unique Selling Capability :  -  Development of assets and methodologies,  development of point- of- view,  research or white papers,  support development of marketing collateral,  public speaking and publication in industry periodicals.  Key Competencies and Characteristics :  -  This individual must be comfortable working at the highest levels of client organizations and interacting closely with the C level executives in a range of environments -  The individual should demonstrate strong analytical and problem solving skills -  The individual should be comfortable functioning in a broadly positioned and highly diverse consulting firm -  The individual should possess an impressive executive demeanor,  a team oriented and collaborative approach,  and excellent presentation skills,  including strong oral and writing capabilities -  The individual should have demonstrated entrepreneurial instinct or strong leadership qualities -  The individual should possess and demonstrate high integrity and credibility as perceived by all those with whom s/ he will work -  The individual should have strong intellect coupled with proficient commercial instincts and business acumen & latest working on Digital Technologies -  The individual should be diplomatic,  flexible,  and have a good team approach. 100K $ Bonus Strategy,  Management Consulting,  Corporate Planning Location : Gurgaon or Mumbai Discussion request : Post 6 pm Monday to Friday. Full day Saturday & Sunday. Personal Meetings : Friday. Westin Gurgaon. ( One day Prior notice) Salary: Not Disclosed by Recruiter Industry:Telecom/ ISP Functional Area:Strategy ,  Management Consulting ,  Corporate Planning Role Category:Corporate Planning/ Consulting/ Strategy Role:Corporate Planning/ Strategy Manager  Desired Candidate Profile Education-   UG: Any Graduate -  Any Specialization,  B.Tech/ B.E. -  Any Specialization PG:Any Postgraduate,  MBA/ PGDM -  Any Specialization Doctorate:Doctorate Not Required Edu -  Btech (top Ranked) OR MBA (top Ranked)

column1: Urgent Opening For Circle Operations Manager-Indore
column2: Position: Circle Operations Manager        Location: Indore        Industry: Telecom                Operations-Passive Infra:        Responsible to achieve monthly service sales revenue targets and ensure service delivery.    Create and execute monthly/weekly preventive maintenance (PM) plan and minimize breakdown (BD) calls.    Ensure that quality of service is maintained and equipment uptime is maintained as per SLA    Spare and inventory management.    Ensure that checks and control on spares, KPI penalty, manpower cost, reimbursements, etc are in place    Study the field failure report and implement strategies to ensure high equipment availability.    Monthly billing and ensure revenue realization.      Projects:        Ensure that revenue targets for installation/commissioning are met on a monthly basis.    Track the progress of projects and update customer and internal stakeholders.    Quality job is executed by vendor so that acceptance testing (AT) is done smoothly.    Ensue timely billing and revenue realization as per payment terms.      Business Growth:        Analyze market trends & formulate selling and marketing strategies.    To understand client needs and expectations & devise solutions accordingly to drive sales, augment turnover and achieve desired target.    Ensure consistent, profitable growth in sales revenue through positive planning, deployment and management.      Hiring, People Engagement & Development:        Maintain adequate manpower in field and office through internal transfer / promotion / hiring.    Technical and process training for new and existing staff.    Analyze training need and implement programs for field engineers.    Periodically measure employee performance and coach/motivate employee to perform better.    Mentor/coach/train high potential/performers to take on added responsibility / new roles    Resolve/highlight employee issues and take decisive actions on non performers.      Customer Satisfaction:        Meet regularly with the customer and update him about field operations.    Share insights with customers to help them perform better.    Apprise customer on new products / service offerings and generate business.    Share details on KPIs, Customer Value Report, Call Analysis Report, etc with customer.     Required Candidate profile Good Communication skills Leadership Good administrator Well versed in people management.? Customer Interaction and management Service of Passive Infra

column2: Brief Role :  Principal Strategy Consultant-  Telecom/  Media & Entertainment   Job Description  Principal Strategy Consultant -  Telecom/ Media & Entertainment -  IIM/ FMS/ MDI  Strategy Consultant (Telecom Media & Entertainment) Experience : Big Four/ Strategy Firms/  Industry Experience ( Telecom,  Media Entertainment) Specific experiences will include : Experience levels in business and consulting : Strategy Consultant : 10 to 14 Years Experience -  Full- time MBA from tier 1 institute. -  Must have deep knowledge in one of the following : Telecom Media or Entertainment Demonstrated expertise and thought Leadership on changing Landscape in the fiercely competitive Telecom Segment: -  Strategic Approach to Pricing & outlining the competitive advantage and the experience of managing the CXO relationship. -  Good Prior Experience in Strategy Consulting Firm. -  Working with senior strategy professionals to manage delivery of modules,  risk,  project economics including planning and budgeting,  defining deliverable content,  ensuring buy- in of proposed solutions from top management levels at the client. -  Target and quantify the value of an operations transformation opportunity,  work on creating a point of view that can be presented to the C- suite and drive targeted improvement.  Business Development :  -  Work on business development opportunities,  identify and quantify value creation opportunities and prepare a business case. Lead or be part of client site visits and preparation of the proposal documents People Development : Performing the role of counselor and advisor to the client Market Development : GTM. RTM overview  Unique Selling Capability :  -  Development of assets and methodologies,  development of point- of- view,  research or white papers,  support development of marketing collateral,  public speaking and publication in industry periodicals.  Key Competencies and Characteristics :  -  This individual must be comfortable working at the highest levels of client organizations and interacting closely with the C level executives in a range of environments -  The individual should demonstrate strong analytical and problem solving skills -  The individual should be comfortable functioning in a broadly positioned and highly diverse consulting firm -  The individual should possess an impressive executive demeanor,  a team oriented and collaborative approach,  and excellent presentation skills,  including strong oral and writing capabilities -  The individual should have demonstrated entrepreneurial instinct or strong leadership qualities -  The individual should possess and demonstrate high integrity and credibility as perceived by all those with whom s/ he will work -  The individual should have strong intellect coupled with proficient commercial instincts and business acumen & latest working on Digital Technologies -  The individual should be diplomatic,  flexible,  and have a good team approach. 100K $ Bonus Strategy,  Management Consulting,  Corporate Planning Location : Gurgaon or Mumbai Discussion request : Post 6 pm Monday to Friday.
